title: Sony Wireless Bluetooth Headphones - Up to 50 Hours Battery Life with Quick Charge Function, On-Ear Model - WH-CH520C.CE7 - Limited Edition - Cappuccino/Beige
description: 50hrs non-stop musicStay powered up for daysWith a super long battery life of up to 50 hours, now you can listen to your favourite music, without the worry of running out of charge. Battery running low? After just 3 minutes of charging time, you can enjoy 1.5 hours of listening time.Select the colour that suits your stylePick the perfect colour to suit you, all whilst enjoying comfortable texture and quality. Choose from black, blue, white, or beige, and find the right shade to compliment your look.Feel comfortable, look greatEnjoy all day comfortStay comfortable for longer, with soft earpads and a lightweight design that enhance your listening experience. To achieve the perfect fit, the adjustable headband for that snug, weightless feel.Take your music wherever you goWherever you’re headed, and whatever your plans are, these lightweight headphones with swivel earcups aren’t just comfortable, they’re compact and portable too. That’s why these are the perfect wireless headphones for travelling.A listening experience just for youYour sound, just how you like itCustomise your sound to fit your preferences. Match the right sound quality to your chosen music genre by choosing from a range of pre-sets. Or use the Sony│Headphones Connect app to create your own pre-sets, adjust your bass levels, and enable features such as speak-to-chat and noise cancellation.Make your music feel more naturalDuring compression of an original music score, high-frequency elements that add detail and richness to your favourite tracks are lost. Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) not only ensures high-quality sound, but restores these elements, bringing your listening experience closer to the original.Multipoint connectionFor your convenience, pair your Bluetooth headphones with two separate Bluetooth devices simultaneously. Expecting a call? Your headphones will identify which device is receiving the call, connecting you automatically to the right device for a seamless, hands-free experience.
